name: Pharmacy
description: Pharmaceutical practice, drug therapy management, and patient medication safety

questions.question_text: Explain the process of verifying a prescription for accuracy and safety.
questions.expected_answer: Check patient info, drug interactions, dosage, allergies, prescriber authority

questions.question_text: How do you handle a situation where you suspect a fraudulent prescription?
questions.expected_answer: Verification with prescriber, documentation, reporting to authorities

questions.question_text: Describe your knowledge of controlled substance scheduling and regulations.
questions.expected_answer: DEA schedules, documentation requirements, storage, dispensing rules

questions.question_text: How do you counsel patients on new medications?
questions.expected_answer: Dosage instructions, side effects, interactions, storage, adherence

questions.question_text: Tell me about a time you caught a potentially dangerous drug interaction.
questions.expected_answer: Detection method, intervention, communication with prescriber, outcome

questions.question_text: Explain the concept of pharmacokinetics and its clinical significance.
questions.expected_answer: Absorption, distribution, metabolism, excretion; dosing adjustments

questions.question_text: How do you manage inventory and prevent medication shortages?
questions.expected_answer: Par levels, automated ordering, therapeutic substitutions, communication

questions.question_text: What is your approach to managing patients on anticoagulant therapy?
questions.expected_answer: INR monitoring, dose adjustments, patient education, interaction awareness

questions.question_text: How do you stay updated with new drug approvals and safety alerts?
questions.expected_answer: FDA alerts, professional journals, continuing education, databases

questions.question_text: Describe your experience with compounding medications.
questions.expected_answer: USP standards, sterile/non-sterile, documentation, quality control

questions.question_text: How would you handle a patient who cannot afford their prescribed medication?
questions.expected_answer: Patient assistance programs, generic alternatives, therapeutic substitution

questions.question_text: Explain the importance of medication therapy management (MTM).
questions.expected_answer: Comprehensive review, identifying problems, optimization, patient outcomes

questions.question_text: How do you handle medication recalls in your pharmacy?
questions.expected_answer: Identification, removal, patient notification, documentation, reporting

questions.question_text: What are the key considerations for pediatric dosing?
questions.expected_answer: Weight-based dosing, age considerations, formulation, safety margins

questions.question_text: Describe your experience with pharmacy automation and technology.
questions.expected_answer: Automated dispensing, robotics, barcode scanning, EHR integration

questions.question_text: How do you prioritize when multiple urgent prescriptions need attention?
questions.expected_answer: Clinical urgency, patient waiting, staffing, systematic approach

questions.question_text: Explain the role of a pharmacist in antimicrobial stewardship.
questions.expected_answer: Appropriate use, dose optimization, de-escalation, resistance monitoring

questions.question_text: How do you ensure accuracy during the dispensing process?
questions.expected_answer: Double-check systems, barcode verification, independent verification

questions.question_text: Tell me about a difficult interaction with a healthcare provider and how you resolved it.
questions.expected_answer: Professional communication, evidence-based recommendations, collaboration

questions.question_text: What immunizations are you trained to administer and what protocols do you follow?
questions.expected_answer: CDC guidelines, screening, administration, monitoring, documentation

questions.question_text: How do you approach medication reconciliation during care transitions?
questions.expected_answer: Best possible medication history, comparison, discrepancy resolution

questions.question_text: Describe the key elements of proper medication storage and handling.
questions.expected_answer: Temperature control, light sensitivity, expiration monitoring, segregation

questions.question_text: How would you manage a patient experiencing an adverse drug reaction in your pharmacy?
questions.expected_answer: Immediate care, assessment, reporting to MedWatch, documentation

questions.question_text: What is your understanding of biosimilars and their role in healthcare?
questions.expected_answer: Regulatory framework, interchangeability, cost savings, patient education

questions.question_text: How do you contribute to improving medication adherence in patients with chronic conditions?
questions.expected_answer: Counseling, simplification, reminders, follow-up, motivational interviewing
